Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids expressing wild-type and mutant LRRK2.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of parkin and ubiquitin in LRRK2 p.G2019S-expressing cells compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated three times with independent transfections.

Technical replicates.Description: Three technical replicates were performed per biological replicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare mutant vs. wild-type groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels within 20% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels exceeding 50% of wild-type control.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were treated with PINK1 c.627_630del (p.A209fs) and wild-type PINK1 plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced levels of PINK1 and parkin ubiquitination in PINK1 p.A209fs-expressing cells compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across independent cell passages.

Technical replicates.Description: Each blot was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 15% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression below 40% of wild-type control.
